thread.section_title: Hotel Le Richemont - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great choice
thread.title_full: Great choice - Review of Hotel Le Richemont, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Taras V
title: Great choice
text:
It was nice and cozzy hotel. Clean and quite room. Pleasent stuff. Magnificent breakfast. While I was booking my apartment it was told that I"ll get two-rooms apartment, but when I checked-in my extra room appeared like just bigger corner((((.
Despite it was great room with clean and lighty shower room.
Hotel seems to be in city center, but when we get for a walk we walked for an hour to get to Notre-Dame. Nice hotel, get to center by metro.
Room Tip: Don't belive in appartment with two rooms See more room tips
